actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to reauthorize the Interagency Council on Homelessness.
short_title: Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005

summary.text: Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Amends the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to extend statutory authority and authorization of appropriations for the United States Interagency Council on Homelessness.

titles.title: Interagency Council on Homelessness Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to amend the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act to reauthorize the Interagency Council on Homelessness.
